title: JavaScript Details
content:
Form Validation: check user input before passing to server (less reliance/offload server)
Keyword var: variable, can be assigned data type implicitly
BOM (Browser Object Model)
  • directly communicate with browser using window object
  • ex: window.alert("text");
DOM (Document Object Model)
  • standard model that treats HTML elements like objects
  • ex: document.getElementById(id), document.getElementsByClassName(name);
